text: Ri Yong-sik is a North Korean politician and agitator. ==Biography== In 2014 he was appointed to be the Chief editor of Rodong Sinmun, the mouthepiece of the Workers' Party of KoreaRodong Sinmun gets new Editor-In-Chief, possibly President, replacing Kim Pyong-ho. In 2016, following the decision of the 7th Congress of the Workers' Party of Korea he was elected to the 7th Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea.Party leadership members elected ==References== Category:Workers' Party of Korea politicians Category:Propaganda in North Korea
